actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: A bill to provide Federal grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach the principles of citizenship and ethics.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish a program of grants to instruct public elementary and secondary school students in the principles of citizenship and ethics. Authorizes appropriations for fiscal years 1981 through 1983 for such purpose.

titles.title: A bill to provide Federal grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach the principles of citizenship and ethics.
